thread.title: Mario Balotelli misses TWO MINUTES of Nice game because he couldn't undo his laces
thread.title_full: Mario Balotelli misses TWO MINUTES of Nice game because he couldn't undo his laces

author: Alex Smith
title: Mario Balotelli misses TWO MINUTES of Nice game because he couldn't undo his laces
text:
Mario Balotelli misses TWO MINUTES of Nice game because he couldn't undo his laces The Italian has previously had fights with bibs in his on-going war with the wardrobe Share Balotelli has re-found his form at Nice (Photo: AFP) Share Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Mario Balotelli has continued his ongoing battle with clothing - after missing TWO MINUTES of action for Nice struggling with his laces. 
Former Manchester City striker Balotelli desperately attempted to loosen his left boot lace as the match was going on behind him. 
Balotelli and a coach heaved on the string - which as everyone knows only makes the knot tighter. 
The Italian bad boy eventually managed to free himself and join the Ligue 1 clash about 100 seconds after everyone else. Balotelli struggles to fight his laces (Photo: @btsportfootball/Twitter) 
Luckily for Balotelli his side managed in his absence - although they could only manage a 1-1 against mid-table Nantes. 
Balotelli has a history of clothing mishaps - after TWO hilarious fights with a bibs at City and Liverpool. 
The hit man famously got in a right tangle back in 2011 trying to put a bib on pre-match before being helped by staff. Balotelli struggles to put a bib on at Liverpool (Photo: Splash News) Balotelli struggles to put a bib on at Manchester City (Photo: MIRROR SCREEN GRAB) 
Three years later, just a couple days into his stint at the Reds, Balotelli wrestled with a bright orange garment 
Balotelli has helped the south of France club to third in the table - although sit seven points behind leaders Monaco with eight games to go. 
The ace has netted 12 times in 22 appearances - seeing three red cards - since switching from Anfield. poll loading Will Mario Balotelli ever win his war with the wardrobe? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
